translation.en: Though many know the tragic love story of Antony and Cleopatra,
translation.ja: アントニーとクレオパトラの 悲恋は有名です

translation.en: the wayward Roman general who fell madly in love with the enchanting Egyptian queen,
translation.ja: ローマの将軍と エジプトの女王が恋に落ち

translation.en: both of them taking their lives rather than face a world without each other,
translation.ja: ２人は悲劇的な死を迎えます

translation.en: few know the secret story of the most sought- after prize and unsolved puzzle of their time.
translation.ja: しかし秘宝の謎については あまり知られていません

translation.en: The mystery of Cleopatra's third egg.
translation.ja: クレオパトラの第３の卵です

translation.en: On their wedding day, as a symbol of his undying devotion,
translation.ja: 婚礼の日 アントニーは 永遠の愛を誓い⸺

translation.en: Mark Antony presented Cleopatra with three bejeweled eggs,
translation.ja: クレオパトラに 宝石を贈りました

translation.en: each one more exquisite than the last.
For centuries, these eggs were thought to be nothing more than myth, rumor.
translation.ja: 何世紀もの間 ただの噂(うわさ)と 思われてきましたが

translation.en: But then, in 1907,
translation.ja: 何世紀もの間 ただの噂(うわさ)と 思われてきましたが 1907年 カイロ郊外で 地元の農民が２つの卵を発掘

translation.en: just outside of Cairo, a local farmer unearthed two of them.
translation.ja: 1907年 カイロ郊外で 地元の農民が２つの卵を発掘

translation.en: Some say the third egg was never found.
Others claim it was discovered, but just as quickly lost, never to be seen again.
translation.ja: 発掘後になくなったという 説もあります

translation.en: Join us as we explore that very question. What happened to Cleopatra's lost egg?
translation.ja: クレオパトラの消えた卵に 何が起きたのか？

translation.en: Who may hold it in their possession?
And most importantly, will we ever see the day in which
all three eggs are reunited for the first time in over 2,000 years?
translation.ja: 2000年以上の時を経て そろう日は訪れるのか？

translation.en: Cleopatra's first egg is on display for all to see
translation.ja: クレオパトラの 第１の卵は⸺

translation.en: at the world- famous Museo Nazionale di Castel Sant'Angelo in Rome.
translation.ja: ローマの国立博物館で 展示されています

translation.en: The second egg has been sold at auction numerous times
translation.ja: 第２の卵は オークションで落札され

translation.en: and currently is held in a private collection.
You're not a cop.
You're right, I'm not.
You know what I mean, Agent. Your badge is no good here. So no American cowboy stuff.
translation.ja: あなたのバッジは ここでは意味がない

translation.en: Don't worry. Left my chaps at home.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　暴れやしない

translation.en: You sure about this?
I know how he thinks. He's gonna do it today. Trust me.
translation.ja: 奴は今日 必ず実行する

translation.en: All right, then, here we go.
- Impossible. - I'm not asking.
translation.ja: 無理だ 来館者を退避させて すべての出入り口を封鎖して

translation.en: You need to shut the museum down, evacuate your visitors, and seal all ingress and egress points immediately.
translation.ja: 来館者を退避させて すべての出入り口を封鎖して

translation.en: And Interpol has the authority to compel me to do so?
translation.ja: インターポールの権限で？

translation.en: Don't test me, Director.
You should listen to her.
And who are you? Her bodyguard?
This is Special Agent John Hartley of the FBI's Behavioral Analysis Unit.
translation.ja: ＦＢＩ行動分析課の ハートリー捜査官

translation.en: He's a consulting profiler who specializes in art crime.
translation.ja: 美術犯罪のプロファイラーよ

translation.en: You don't look like a profiler.
Yeah, I get that a lot.
Forty- one hours ago, Agent Hartley received credible intelligence that
translation.ja: 国際手配中の美術品泥棒 ノーラン･ブースが⸺

translation.en: the most wanted art thief in the world, a man named Nolan Booth,
translation.ja: 国際手配中の美術品泥棒 ノーラン･ブースが⸺ 今日 クレオパトラの卵を 盗むという情報が

translation.en: intends to steal the Egg of Cleopatra today.
translation.ja: 今日 クレオパトラの卵を 盗むという情報が

translation.en: Who provided you this information?
The Bishop.
You cannot be serious.
My dear, The Bishop is nothing more than a boogeyman story in the art world.
translation.ja: ビショップは 美術界のブギーマンだ

translation.en: It's a catch- all concept. It's someone to blame when you and your friends in law enforcement are too incompetent to solve the case.
translation.ja: 事件を解決できない捜査官が 作り上げた幻想にすぎない

translation.en: Listen to me, unless we stop it, that egg is gonna be stolen today.
translation.ja: 卵が盗まれてもいいの？

translation.en: In fact, it may already be gone.
Already gone, you say?
Now, if you'll excuse me, Inspector, I believe I owe your supervisor a call.
translation.ja: 悪いが 君の上司に 連絡させてもらう

translation.en: Do you have thermal sensors in this room?
- Of course we do. - Show it to me.
You're wasting our time.
What, may I ask, are you looking for?
Well, you see, Cleopatra's first egg is covered in 18- karat gold. And gold reflects radiation.
translation.ja: 卵は18金で覆われていて 熱を反射する

translation.en: That egg should be reflecting the heat in this room. It should be red, not blue.
translation.ja: つまり赤く見えるはずだ 青ではない

translation.en: It's probably just an error in the thermal sensor.
Well, there's only one way to find out.
Hey, sorry, big man, but there's no food or drink in the museum.
translation.ja: 悪いが 館内での 飲食は禁止だ

translation.en: Thank you.
No, no, wait a moment. What do you think you're doing?
Relax, it's fine. He knows what he's doing.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　彼に任せて

translation.en: Seal the room. Now!
Move! Move!
He's heading for the exit.
Freeze!
He is here. Send reinforcements.
He's on the scaffolding. We're gonna need more--
I know you. You're the… You're the slow bald guy that's been chasing me.
translation.ja: 俺を追ってる うすのろハゲか

translation.en: What do you got in the bag?
You're American. What brings you to Rome?
Gelato, the Colosseum.
- Oh, it's beautiful. Beautiful place. - Yeah.
translation.ja: 美しい遺跡だ　初めて？

translation.en: - First time? - Yep.
translation.ja: 美しい遺跡だ　初めて？ ああ

translation.en: That was a fun foot chase, right? Lots of twists and turns. Hijinks. Who knew it'd end up like this?
translation.ja: こんな所で会えるなんて 奇遇だな

translation.en: - I did. - Right.
Fun's over, Nolan Booth. Give me the bag, turn around, put your hands behind your back. You're under arrest.
translation.ja: 追いかけっこは終わりだ バッグを渡せ　逮捕する

translation.en: Okay. Well, hold on one sec. I just have two questions.
translation.ja: 分かった その前に２つだけ聞きたい

translation.en: Okay. Um…
translation.ja: 分かった その前に２つだけ聞きたい そのジャケットはどこで？

translation.en: First question, where'd you get that jacket?
translation.ja: そのジャケットはどこで？

translation.en: It's a statement piece.
Somewhere there is a very nude cow whispering…  …Worth it.
translation.ja: 皮をはがれた牛も 喜んでるだろう

translation.en: And number two, on the whole arresting me thing, I totally get it.
translation.ja: 俺は逮捕されて当然だ

translation.en: You know, baby did a bad, bad thing. Yeah.
But you don't happen to have, like, a badge or somethin'
translation.ja: でも捜査官のバッジは？

translation.en: tucked away in the turtleneck, do you?
translation.ja: タートルネックの下か？

translation.en: I don't need to show you my badge because I've got a gun.
Here's the thing. You're putting me in a pickle. Without identification, how do I know who you are?
translation.ja: あんたが捜査官だという 証拠は？

translation.en: For all I know, you could be the bad guy,
and I could be the other bad guy.
You're right. I am the bad guy.
Now shut up and give me the bag before I shoot you in the mouth.
translation.ja: バッグをよこせ　撃つぞ

translation.en: - I'm gonna give this to you. - Good.
Yeah, I'm just gonna give it to you 'cause I don't even want it.
translation.ja: いいよ こんな物くれてやる　邪魔だ

translation.en: For the record, none of this feels good.
translation.ja: こんな物くれてやる　邪魔だ

translation.en: Booth, don't move!
Come on, let's go.
What the hell?
Where are you going? Asshole!
Can you hold on to this for me?
- Thanks. -
What the hell? You idiot! Are you blind?
Nice place you got here.
Special Agent John Hartley, FBI. We met earlier.
translation.ja: ＦＢＩ特別捜査官 ジョン･ハートリーだ

translation.en: Aren't you a little outside your jurisdiction?
translation.ja: ここはあんたの管轄外だろ？

translation.en: I am.
Good thing these guys aren't.
Hi, guys. Don't take your shoes off or anything.
translation.ja: やあ　土足で構わないよ

translation.en: You sure you brought enough guns?
What can I say? I like to be thorough.
No way, José.
- The intrepid Inspector Das. -
I wouldn't have missed this for the world. I'll take that. Thank you.
translation.ja: 会いたかった　これは預かる

translation.en: - It's nice to meet a fan. - Oh, that's cute.
translation.ja: 俺のファン？ 余裕ね

translation.en: You wanna know what else is cute? Because you're wanted in 18 separate countries, I get to choose which one of them detains you until trial,
translation.ja: あなたは国際手配中だから 勾留地は私が決められる

translation.en: given your escape history.
What are you, six for six now?
Yeah. One more and I get a Shawshank jacket.
Keep making your jokes because I'm about to send you to the worst place in the world.
translation.ja: 世界最悪の場所に送るわよ

translation.en: Your Instagram account?
You know, I'm really starting to not like you.
translation.ja: マジでムカついてきた

translation.en: Oh, come on!
Not like me? You don't even know me.
We could have a lot in common.
Maybe I don't know you, but I've been building a profile on you,
translation.ja: あんたのことは調べてある

translation.en: ever since you stole William Strang's Lady with a Red Hat from the Tate back in 2014.
translation.ja: 2014年に 「赤い帽子の女性」を盗んだ

translation.en: You can't prove that was me.
I got that on Etsy.
I've been tracking your scores for a while. So let me take a crack at who I think you really are.
translation.ja: 他にもある あんたを分析しよう

translation.en: Sure thing. Yeah.
- Only child. - Mmm- hmm.
Dad's a Swiss cop, Mom's an American professor.
translation.ja: 父親は警官　母親は教授

translation.en: You started stealing between the ages of six and eight.
You found out you had a real talent for it. It made you feel special, different.
translation.ja: 特別な才能に気づき 優越感を抱いた

translation.en: You like to work alone. You don't like a team. The only jobs you take are the ones that make the big, splashy headlines,
translation.ja: 一匹オオカミで 世間を騒がす仕事しかしない

translation.en: which tells me that you only do it for the thrill and not the money.
translation.ja: 欲しいのはスリルで 金じゃない

translation.en: Are you insane? I love the money.
translation.ja: バカな　金は大好きだ

translation.en: I'm not done yet. I'm just getting to the good part.
translation.ja: 面白いのは⸺ これからだ

translation.en: - Thank you. - You're welcome.
A lot of thieves out there who claim to only do it for the money. That's not unusual.
translation.ja: 金目当てだと 主張する窃盗犯は多い

translation.en: But what is unusual is the risk that you take. The chances.
translation.ja: あんたが違うのは リスクをいとわないこと

translation.en: It's as though you wanna get caught so you can escape,
translation.ja: まるで脱走するために 捕まってるようだ

translation.en: just to prove yourself all over again,
translation.ja: 脱走に成功することで⸺

translation.en: and prove that you're better than everybody else
translation.ja: 脱走に成功することで⸺ 自分の価値を示したいんだ

translation.en: and that you're worthy.
translation.ja: 自分の価値を示したいんだ

translation.en: Worthy of what? This speech?
Your father's love.
Congratulations.
How'd you find me?
Well, the same way I knew that you were gonna steal the egg in Rome.
translation.ja: ローマと同じ 情報提供者がいる

translation.en: The Bishop.
The Bishop.
Get him ready to move.
Booth, I'm curious.
How does it feel to be sold out by the most wanted art thief in the world?
translation.ja: 世界一の泥棒に 売られた気分は？

translation.en: I'm the most wanted art thief in the world.
You were.
Wait. Wait here.
There's no chance I'm putting that thing in the same van as him.
- See you at the airfield. - I'll see you there.
Door open.
All right. We're good.
Thank you.
Hi, there.
- You leaving town? - Flight's in an hour.
Something up?
You could say that. Hmm.
Okay. What's going on?
Funny, I was gonna ask you the same thing.
What are you doing with that?
Oh, this priceless piece of ancient cultural whatnot?
translation.ja: この極めて貴重な 古代の秘宝のこと？

translation.en: Booth gave us a fake egg.
I'll admit, Booth was my first thought too.
translation.ja: 最初はブースを疑った

translation.en: Then I asked myself, How well do you really know someone you only met 72 hours ago?
translation.ja: でも あなたにも 72時間前に会ったばかり

translation.en: And someone whose official credentials came solely by a written interagency communiqué.
translation.ja: 公的な身分証は 紙切れ１枚だけ

translation.en: So I called up the Assistant Director of the BAU at Quantico, really nice lady.
translation.ja: ＦＢＩ行動分析課の 次長に聞いたら⸺ あなたを知らないって

translation.en: She'd never heard of you.
translation.ja: あなたを知らないって

translation.en: - That's impossible. - Is it? Yes, it's impossible.
As impossible as a John Hartley with a Swiss bank account
that received an $8 million wire transfer from an encrypted third- party on the same day the egg was stolen?
translation.ja: あなたのスイスの口座に 800万ドルが振り込まれた

translation.en: Quite a coincidence, wouldn't you say, Agent?
translation.ja: それも あり得ない偶然よね

translation.en: Listen, whatever you think this is, whatever you think I did, I didn't do.
translation.ja: ダス　信じてくれ 俺は何もやってない

translation.en: Someone's behind this. The Bishop, maybe even Booth himself.
translation.ja: ビショップかブースに ハメられたんだ

translation.en: - I'm being set up. - Maybe you are, maybe you're not.
translation.ja: ビショップかブースに ハメられたんだ だとしても とりあえず勾留する

translation.en: Until I figure it out, I'm gonna keep you where I can find you.
translation.ja: だとしても とりあえず勾留する

translation.en: Now, normally, I'm not a vindictive person, but,
translation.ja: 制裁は好きじゃないけど——

translation.en: well, I trusted you and you hurt my feelings. So I picked someplace extra special.
translation.ja: 信頼を裏切られたから 特別な場所を用意した

translation.en: It's a bit of a black site. Kind of the land due process forgot.
translation.ja: とっておきの秘密施設よ

translation.en: You're under arrest, Agent Hartley.
Das, look at me. Look at my eyes.
translation.ja: ダス　俺の目を見ろ

translation.en: I didn't do this.
I don't believe you.
You a top or a bottom?
translation.ja: 上下 どっちがいい？

translation.en: Doesn't matter. Prison's gonna decide for us.
You gotta be shittin' me.
Well, I'll say one thing about ol' Inspector Das, she's got a real sense of humor.
translation.ja: ダスは ユーモアのセンスがある

translation.en: Put 'er there, roomie.
You're right, we should wash up first.
It's okay. You're safe here.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　ここは安全だ

translation.en: Except if they find out you're a cop. Then they're gonna wanna kill you.
translation.ja: サツだとバレたら 殺されるけどな

translation.en: Bishop must have seen you coming from a mile away.
translation.ja: ビショップにハメられたか

translation.en: Got your trust after selling me out. Can't run a con without gaining the mark's trust first, that's page one.
translation.ja: 俺を売り 信用させた 詐欺の基本手口だ

translation.en: I know how a confidence scheme works, trust me.
Well, you do now, that's for sure.
The same mystery thief who ratted me out is the same one who framed you. That seems like a coincidence, don't you think?
translation.ja: 俺たちが同じ奴に ハメられたのは偶然か？

translation.en: This is not a coincidence. This is a plan.
translation.ja: 偶然じゃない　巧妙な計画だ

translation.en: In one move, The Bishop took out her lead competitor and lead investigator.
translation.ja: ライバルと捜査官を陥れた

translation.en: - Two birds, one stone. - Egg.
- What? - Two birds, one egg. It's kind of a lay- up. Even Post Malone gets it.
translation.ja: 卵も手に入れた ポスト･マローンにも分かる

translation.en: This is farm- to- table, right? Thank you.
translation.ja: 地産地消？ ありがとう

translation.en: I don't understand why. Why would The Bishop go to the trouble of framing me when she already has the egg?
translation.ja: 卵を手に入れたのに なぜ俺をハメた？

translation.en: I mean, what's left?
Three hundred million dollars?
You're kidding. I never heard of a price tag like that.
No one has.
But you don't understand, that's not the price for just one egg.
Here's the deal. Whoever brings this Egyptian billionaire all three eggs
translation.ja: 条件はエジプトの富豪の 娘の結婚式に⸺

translation.en: by the night of his daughter's wedding gets all the marbles.
translation.ja: ３つの卵を届けること それで３億ドルだ

translation.en: Turns out, Mr. Big Daddy Big Bucks' daughter,
translation.ja: その娘の名は何だと思う？

translation.en: guess what her name is? Stop guessing, it's Cleopatra.
translation.ja: なんとクレオパトラだ

translation.en: I mean, these people are horrible. But I like money, so…
translation.ja: ろくでもない連中だが 俺は金が欲しい

translation.en: So how does that work?
No one knows where the third egg is. It's never been found.
I'm not gonna lie, that's a bit of a problem.
translation.ja: 正直 それが問題だが

translation.en: I was gonna deal with the second egg first. Then the rest.
translation.ja: ２つ目を手に入れてから 考える

translation.en: All right, well, Bureau intel says that the second egg is owned by an international arms dealer.
translation.ja: 第２の卵の持ち主は 国際的な武器商人だ

translation.en: Sotto Voce. I know all about this guy.
His dad tried to strangle him when he was 14. Nobody can stand this son of a bitch.
translation.ja: 14歳で父親に 殺されかけたほどの悪党だ

translation.en: Apparently, it left quite the impression on him. And strangling folks became sort of a hobby for him.
translation.ja: それがきっかけで 拷問が趣味になった

translation.en: He's a big fan.
Sotto Voce is super scary. But he's not above having a good time.
translation.ja: イカれた野郎だが サービス精神もある

translation.en: Throws a masquerade party every year for his top buyers
translation.ja: 毎年 上客を呼んで⸺

translation.en: in his I- probably- have- a- tiny- penis villa in Valencia.
translation.ja: 仮面パーティーを開いてる

translation.en: Gunrunners are a little touchy about their identity.
So the Eyes Wide Shut thing takes the edge off for everyone.
translation.ja: 顔を隠せるのは都合がいい

translation.en: Now, what none of these evil one- percenters know
is that upstairs, locked away in a secret vault, Dr. Shirtless has in his possession
translation.ja: ボーチェ邸の２階には 秘密の金庫室がある

translation.en: an ancient piece of pricelessness that I like to call…
Cleopatra's second egg.
translation.ja: クレオパトラの第２の卵

translation.en: And it's just begging for me to steal it.
I'd be on my way there right now if you weren't such a super cop.
translation.ja: あんたがサツでなきゃな

translation.en: - Don't do that. - What? - Don't do that. - Do what?
- I know what you're doing. Listen. - I'm not doing anything.
translation.ja: とぼけるな　わざと言ったろ

translation.en: These guys here, if they find out you're a C- O- P…
translation.ja: あんたがサツだとバレたら…

translation.en: This is a room full of convicted murderers and toilet vodka enthusiasts.
translation.ja: 周りはヤバい殺人犯だらけだ

translation.en: We gotta make sure they know you're not a cop.
Guys? Nyet politsiya. Not a cop.
translation.ja: みんな　彼はサツじゃない

translation.en: This man is not a cop, all right?
translation.ja: 絶対にサツじゃない いいか　よく覚えとけ

translation.en: Get that through your thick skulls right now!
translation.ja: いいか　よく覚えとけ

translation.en: He's a profiler for the FBI,
which does fall under the umbrella of law enforcement, but not a cop.
translation.ja: 法の番人だがサツじゃない

translation.en: It's similar, but it's not the same thing. It's a complicated backstory.
translation.ja: 似てるけど一緒にするな

translation.en: This is our good friend, Special Agent John Hartley.
translation.ja: 特別捜査官 ジョン･ハートリーだ

translation.en: Let's give him a warm welcome to the prison, guys.
Thank you, guys.  I don't think anyone heard me. We're good.
translation.ja: どうも 誰も聞いてない

translation.en: All's quiet on the western front. - Nobody's… Oh, no. -
Yep. Drago Grande heard. Here he comes.
Okay, be cool. Don't embarrass me.
Hello, sir.
Politsiya.
You die.
Okay, he knows.
He knows you're a cop.
The jig is up.
It's okay.
You can have mine. You need some nourishment.
translation.ja: 俺のを食え　栄養をつけろ

translation.en: You should get up. You look like a little bitch right now.
translation.ja: やり返せよ　情けないぞ

translation.en: I say that as a friend.
Okay, look.
I don't wanna do the whole prison fight thing with you…
- You got this. I'm in your corner. - So please, no fight.
translation.ja: 俺は味方だ 頼む　ほっといてくれ

translation.en: Let's just go back and finish our meals.
- No. No-- - Back to your cell!
God…
All that working out.
You still get your ass spanked by a toothless man with tuberculosis--
translation.ja: あんな奴にボコられて…

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
If you ever pull shit like that again, it'll be the last thing you do.
Right.
- You don't know me, Booth. - No.
You have no idea what I'm capable of.
Okay. Thank God, you're here.
The captain wants to see you. Let's go!
translation.ja: 〈看守長が呼んでる　来い〉

translation.en: Him?
Oh, no, us. Okay.
Hello, boys.
Oh, my God.
You're the captain?
You might benefit from a little career change.
I mean, I'm… I don't think runway, but definitely regional catalog work, fliers…
translation.ja: ショーは無理でも カタログモデルにはなれる

translation.en: She's The Bishop.
No shit, dipdick!
It's so nice to finally meet you, Mr. Booth.
translation.ja: 会えてうれしいわ　ブース

translation.en: Such a thrill to be face- to- face with the second- best art thief in the world.
translation.ja: あなたが世界で２番目の 美術品泥棒ね
